x-terminal-emulator: x-terminal-emulator -t 'Inxi Info' -e bash -c "inxi -Fxrzm; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -t 'Qemu Installer' -e "qemu-installer;   echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -t 'Steam Installer' -e "steam-installer;   echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -t 'Virtualbox Installer' -e "virtualbox-installer;   echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -t 'Sleek Kernel Installer' -e "sleek-kernel-installer;  echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -t 'Liquorix Kernel Installer' -e "liquorix-kernel-installer;  echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -t 'Live-build Apps Installer' -e "live-build-apps-installer;  echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -t 'Kernel Packages Installer' -e "kernel-apps-installer;  echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
